Alert.Description: PHB:165 (Initiative bonus applied to trainer while you are the active Pokémon)

Elemental Adept.Description: PHB:166 (Choose one of the Pokémon damage types)

Great Weapon Master.Description: PHB:167 (Applies to any melee attacks, once per move. Extra crit attack must be same move)

Sharp Shooter.Description: PHB:170 (Applies to any ranged attack, once per move.)

Extra Move.Description: Your Pokémon can know five total moves instead of four.

AC Up.Description: Your Pokémon’s AC increases by 1. This bonus is included through a Pokémon’s evolutions.

Tireless.Description: Your Pokémon endures hours of rigorous training which keep it in battle longer than the average Pokémon. Gain +1 PP for every move.

Terrain Adept.Description: Your Pokémon is especially skilled when fighting on a specific terrain. Choose one of the following terrains when selecting this feature. Your Pokémon gains +2 to attack rolls when in this terrain. Terrains: Coastal, Swamp, Forest, Arctic, Desert, Grassland, Hill, Mountain, Underwater.

Combo Master.Description: Your Pokémon is an expert in combining strikes against a foe. When this feature is selected, combo moves that have the ability to hit more than once are guaranteed to hit at least twice. (Fury Swipes, Double Slap, etc.)

Smooth Facade.Description: Your Pokémon is hardened, shrugging pain off like it is nothing. When suffering from a negative status ailment other than sleep, your Pokémon gains +3 to their AC.

Power Sculptor.Description: Your Pokémon is able to sculpt the power of their moves around their allies. For area of effect moves your Pokémon activates, choose 1 + MOVE allies in range to automatically succeed on their saving throw against taking damage or an effect. If the damage is halved for a successful save, they take no damage instead.

Hidden Ability.Description: Your Pokémon reaches inside itself to discover a new ability. It gains access to the Hidden Ability in its stat block.
